decision_conditions: The Council agrees that the amendments to which this decision relates are sufficiently minor in terms of their scale and impact (both individually and cumulatively) in planning terms, having regard to the overall scope of the previously approved development, so as to constitute a non-material amendment to the original planning permission/consent. This letter does not constitute a new planning permission. The development should be built in full accordance with the original planning permission except where amended by this decision.

Condition 3 of planning permission 24/01488/FUL: "(a) Prior to the commencement of above ground development, detailed drawings at a scale of 1:10/1:5 of the following features shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority:- Details of street furniture- Location and design of new switch rooms, transformers and substations(b) Prior to the commencement of built structures (excluding new transformer, switch rooms and substations), detailed drawings at a scale of 1:10 / 1:5 of the following features shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority:- 1:10 details of all openings (windows, doors)- 1:5 of key elements of the building/landscape- Location and design of new generator and fuel tanks- PV Panels- Details of rooftop plant and paraphernaliaThe developer shall submit a site plan / elevation and key plans / elevations where applicable associated with each detail identifying the location of each typical detail.The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved drawings.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development."Condition 3 is replaced with:"(a) Prior to the commencement of above ground development, details of the location, layout and specification of the following features shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority:- Details of street furniture- Details of new switch rooms, transformers and substations(b) Prior to the commencement of built structures (excluding new transformer, switch rooms and substations), details of the location, layout and specification of the following features shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority:- Details of all openings (windows, doors)(c) Within 6 months of the commencement of built structures, details of the location, layout and specification of the following features shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority:- Details of new generator and fuel tanks- Details of rooftop plant and paraphernalia to be installed on the roof of the buildingsFor all parts of the condition, the developer shall submit site plans, floor plans and elevations where applicable identifying the location and layout of each typical detail.The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved drawings, and maintained thereafter in accordance with the approved details. Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development."
